## allChildren variable

Helper function for [walk](./shader-ast.walk.md)<!-- -->. Returns an array of all child nodes for a given term (if any).

[scopedChildren](./shader-ast.scopedchildren.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
allChildren: (t: Term<any>) => any
```
